Looks menacing, but it does not come to any conclusion. This is a case where one player does not want to defend, and instead acts on the offense. White acted in desperation when there was no need. If the game had continued with a defensive strategy, white would have an uncomfortable game, but he would have drawing chances.

The key move in my calculations. After f6, the king can run away to safety. All white's sacrifices have amounted to nothing because of one defensive move. The last game I played with this opponent, he had similar game against me. Maybe he overestimated his chances.
